    • Method Detail

      • placeStone

        public void placeStone(Stone stone)
        Places a stone on the board. Stones are mostly validated before this call. The stone is connected top top down left right stones if they are available.
        Parameters:
        stone - takes a Stone and make sure it is placed properly on the board.

      • removeStone

        public void removeStone(Stone stone)
        Removes the stone and sets the neighbors reference to this stone back to null.
        Parameters:
        The - Stone to be removed from the board.

      • createSuggestions

        public boolean createSuggestions(Stone stone)
        Creates new suggestions for hinting and AI.
        Parameters:
        stone - the stone which is placed at the board.
        Returns:
        whether or not assigning succeeded.

      • makeMove

        public int makeMove(Stone[] stones)
        Checks move for validity and then returns a score if it is proper. Saves the last make moves to make sure undo works.
        Parameters:
        stones - Stone array containing the made moves.
        Returns:
        Returns a value containing the gained score. Returns -1 if the move was invalid.

      • getRows

        Parameters:
        searchDirection - True if has to search in y direction false if has to search in x direction.

        Returns:
